node.display_long_description:
Rec Room - Join the Club!

Rec Room is THE place for you and your friends to build and play games together. Party up with Rec Roomers from all around the world to chat, hang out, explore millions of player-created rooms, or build something new and amazing to share with us all.
Rec Room is free, and cross plays on everything from phones to VR headsets. It’s the social app you play like a video game!

- Customize and dress up your cute Rec Room avatar to express your style
- Discover challenging, fun or straight up weird games made by creators just like you
- Try your skill with the Maker Pen
- Join the best community - Rec Room is a fun and welcoming place for people from all walks of life! Let us help you find people you’ll LOVE to hang out with.

Come and join the club!

Enhance your experience with the optional membership to Rec Room Plus (RR+) for $7.99/Month. Cancel at any time. Membership gives you access to free items, exclusive content, and tons of tokens.

latest_supported_binary.change_log:
Rec Room PATCH  - the "Circuits V2" edition

## Party System Improvements!

- A Fist Bump icon is now displayed next to the names of players who are in your party.
- When you are in a party, there is now an "In Party" button that shows on your watch menu. The button has the same color as your current party color and links to the new Party tab on the People menu.
- You can now restrict "Voices I can hear" to just party members.
- The Go To button now detects existing party / game invites and consumes those if you have an existing one. Clicking Go To will just consume the invite and take you to whoever invited you instead of sending a new Go To request.

## General Improvements

- New watch menu UI is much more responsive and consistent on all platforms, even when running/falling/moving.
- Lots more screens in the new UI style including RR+, keys, and token purchasing screens. In addition, we have a new and improved "check out" experience when you buy items.
- Small buttons are more reliable to press.
- Menu laser is more visible over light themed backgrounds.
- Scrolling starts easier on screens when clicking and dragging.
- Tool menus are partially improved with these changes (on screens, and VR while the menu is detached). We will make the menus better while attached to the tool soon!
- Avatar customization menu is larger in VR.
- We now preserve returning players mic settings through orientation.

As always, thanks for playing Rec Room!

Please see here for convenient links to controls, tutorials, comfort options, etc.: https://recroom.com/community
We love to hear your feedback, so please don't hesitate to let us know what you think...

node.reviewDescription:
______________________________________________

I suppose that yes, there are toxic kids, racist kids, or just straight up garbage kids. It comes with the Voice Chat. Roblox has the SAME kids, just... no mic! If you are looking for a child friendly, completely fun and games and happiness, this is not the game for you. This game is for people who enjoy having social experiences with amazing people who are supportive, and can deal with the occasional (mostly occasional) kids who don’t want you to have fun. 

PAY ATTENTION TO THIS: 

Rec Room is not a game for the easily offended. It’s not a game for your precious child who you want to keep pure until they are teenagers. This IS a game for people looking for new experiences and are able to deal with the jerks and toxic kids in exchange for finding friends, having fun, and playing games.

To be honest, this game is my favorite game in Vr, and I am used to the good and bad. Ultimately you should get this game to play with friends, meet new ones, and to become more knowledgeable in what VR can be.

______________________________________________
node.reviewTitle: Not bad, just too much exposure
